Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value, worth $10,000 to you, and we believe it would greatly enhance your endeavors or personal collection. Considering its unparalleled quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending a special offer to purchase this product directly from us at a price of $9,500. This is an excellent chance to secure such a valuable asset at a reduced cost. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. We look forward to serving you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
